resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

string.name: tfe_ic_gpu_quant_error
string.translation_description: Error regarding GPU support for Quant models[CHAR_LIMIT=60]

resources.string: GPU does not yet supported quantized models.

The navigation bar on the bottom can be used to easily access the different main parts of the application.


To get started, head over to the map to see the different locations available for scanning in your area.


When you have reached a location, navigate to the scan-window to scan the object with your camera.


Once a question have been opened, make sure you have media-sound turned on in your phone and press play to start the question. Answer the question by shaking the phone in either direction.


When you have answered as many questions you like, head back to this page for instructions on how to grade the quiz.
